creator: carnold@houston.rr.com
text:
Delphi/Kylix compilation and linking could be fairly readily done by developing
compiler and linker adapters for the cpptasks project at
http://ant-contrib.sourceforge.net.  cpptasks already supports the Borland C++
compiler and languages other than C++.

Declined 10yrs ago.
Kylix is dead, Borland is also not available any more.
creator: jan@materne.de
